h2_title: Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast Boss Fight and Guide
content: It will sometimes roll over when it tries to punch you and misses, allowing you to perform a quick follow-up attack. Where it differs from the other bosses, is that it will also leap up in the air and land like a frog, creating an explosion around it each time it lands. This move can be quite erratic, but you can avoid it entirely by keeping your distance.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bishui_Golden-Eyed_Beast.md', within the main section titled 'Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast', specifically from the subsection 'Bishui Golden-Eyed Beast Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
It will sometimes roll over when it tries to punch you and misses, allowing you to perform a quick follow-up attack. Where it differs from the other bosses, is that it will also leap up in the air and land like a frog, creating an explosion around it each time it lands. This move can be quite erratic, but you can avoid it entirely by keeping your distance.
